title: karuNa cooDu
sahitya:
karuNa jUDu ninnu nammina vADUgadA inta parAkElanamma



(karuNa)







anupallavi







sarasijAsana mAdhava shambhu nata caraNA brhannAyaki vEgamE



(karuNa)







caraNam 1







dIna janAvana mUrtini nIvani nEnu ninnu neranammitini



gAna vinOdini ghana nibha vENi kAmita phaladA samayamidE



(karuNa)







caraNam 2







nI mahima atishayambula entani nE jeppudunu O lalitA



hEmapAngi himagiri putri mahEshvari girIsha ramaNi nI



(karuNa)







caraNam 3







shyAmakrSNa  paripAlini shUlini sAmaja gamana kundaradana



tAmasambiDula sEyaka nA paritApamulani pariharinci



(karuna)
